name: Percentage of items of high anticholinergic burden
title: Percentage of items of high anticholinergic burden
description: Percentage of items of high anticholinergic burden
y_label: Percentage of items of high anticholinergic burden
numerator_from: INNER JOIN {measures}.vw__acb_bnf_codes acb ON CONCAT(SUBSTR(p.bnf_code,0,9),'AA', SUBSTR(p.bnf_code,-2), SUBSTR(p.bnf_code,-2)) = acb.bnf_code -- joins prescribing data to acb view
